roleset.name: obstruct a passage, obstructed
roleset.note: CONGEST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'congest' based on ectb2; adjectival 'congested' based on BOLT-7. Comparison with 'clog.' No VerbNet entry. (from congest.01-v)
CONGESTION-N NOTES: Based on frame for congest-v.01. Framed by Anwen March 2011. (from congestion.01-n)

roles.note: It is VERY important to distinguish the agent and the congesting substance! (from congest.01-v)

example.name: congest-v: Overcrowding
example.text: [The campus sidewalks]-1 were congested *-1 with people.

example.name: congest-v: Cold Agent, all Args
example.text: The cold congested my sinuses with mucus.

example.name: congested-j
example.text: Roads are congested and people are angry !

example.name: congestion-n: Arg1
example.text: The patient's congestion was not relieved with decongestants.
